PROFILE_SETTINGS.TITLE: Profile Settings
PROFILE_SETTINGS.AFTER_EMAIL_CHANGED: Your profile has been updated successfully, please login again as your login credentials are changed

PROFILE_SECTION.TITLE: Profile
PROFILE_SECTION.NOTE: Your email address is your identity and is used to log in.

PASSWORD_SECTION.TITLE: Password
PASSWORD_SECTION.NOTE: Updating your password would reset your logins in multiple devices.

ACCESS_TOKEN.TITLE: Access Token
ACCESS_TOKEN.NOTE: This token can be used if you are building an API based integration

EMAIL_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.TITLE: Email Notifications
EMAIL_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.NOTE: Update your email notification preferences here
EMAIL_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.CONVERSATION_ASSIGNMENT: Send email notifications when a conversation is assigned to me
EMAIL_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.CONVERSATION_CREATION: Send email notifications when a new conversation is created
EMAIL_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.CONVERSATION_MENTION: Send email notifications when you are mentioned in a conversation
EMAIL_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.ASSIGNED_CONVERSATION_NEW_MESSAGE: Send email notifications when a new message is created in an assigned conversation

API.UPDATE_SUCCESS: Your notification preferences are updated successfully
API.UPDATE_ERROR: There is an error while updating the preferences, please try again

PUSH_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.TITLE: Push Notifications
PUSH_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.NOTE: Update your push notification preferences here
PUSH_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.CONVERSATION_ASSIGNMENT: Send push notifications when a conversation is assigned to me
PUSH_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.CONVERSATION_CREATION: Send push notifications when a new conversation is created
PUSH_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.CONVERSATION_MENTION: Send push notifications when you are mentioned in a conversation
PUSH_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.ASSIGNED_CONVERSATION_NEW_MESSAGE: Send push notifications when a new message is created in an assigned conversation
PUSH_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.HAS_ENABLED_PUSH: You have enabled push for this browser.

NAME.LABEL: Your full name
NAME.ERROR: Please enter a valid full name

DISPLAY_NAME.LABEL: Display name
DISPLAY_NAME.ERROR: Please enter a valid display name
DISPLAY_NAME.PLACEHOLDER: Please enter a display name, this would be displayed in conversations

EMAIL.LABEL: Your email address
EMAIL.ERROR: Please enter a valid email address
EMAIL.PLACEHOLDER: Please enter your email address, this would be displayed in conversations

PASSWORD.LABEL: Password
PASSWORD.ERROR: Please enter a password of length 6 or more

PASSWORD_CONFIRMATION.LABEL: Confirm new password
PASSWORD_CONFIRMATION.ERROR: Confirm password should match the password

SIDEBAR_ITEMS.SELECTOR_SUBTITLE: Select an account from the following list

API.ERROR_MESSAGE: Could not connect to Woot Server, Please try again later
